title: Pavel Laktiushkin - projects list
seoDescription: Pavel Laktiushkin is involved in the following projects

projects.name: Video Cloud
projects.description: Rhonda Celesta Cloud is a distributed high-available scalable multi-component platform designed to receive, store, and deliver multimedia and other data.
projects.duties: Backend platform: Feature design and development, bug fixing, performance profiling and optimising

projects.name: Versatile end-to-end framework for cameras testing
projects.description: A unified solution for high-level testing camera devices. Since the company concentrates on camera embedded software development, there appeared a need to develop a single unified approach to automated testing of multimedia devices. The framework is a flexible platform which can be customised and tuned according to device-under-test specifications and write very simple and human-readable tests. The solution is being used all camera projects in the company.

projects.name: Corporate ERP
projects.description: Modular web application which provides services for corporate needs. Implements both WebUI(Thymeleaf) and REST API(SpringMVC) integration endpoints.
projects.duties: Technical lead, full-stack design and development from scratch.

projects.name: YESP main site
projects.description: A e-commerce platform, based on Broadleaf commerce, which implements the 'group buy' business process. The site consists of both user-side web application and admin web application.
projects.duties: Technical lead, full-stack design and implementation(single engineer)
